channel.title: Test my new hosting service - and get free hosting for life
channel.description:
Why hello there moparians!
I am currently in the process of launching a brand new web hosting service - as some of you may know, I ran a successful small business host from 2003 until late last year, where I was forced to sell the outfit due to a new course I was starting that took up most of my time.
Now my time is once again free and I am launching a similar service, this time aimed at home users like your sexy selves. Before I unleash this masterpiece upon the masses, however, I require some beta testers to make sure everything is running smoothly.
If you are interested, drop an email to mopman@gmail.com with your name+contact details and a short paragraph about your website if you have one, or what you intend to do with your hosting if you do not. We need people from all walks of life, so if you are just intending to use it for development/playing around, then say so! All beta testers will recieve free hosting for life at the end of the trial period.
Testers do not require any technical experience at all, just the willingness to report bugs and make suggestions for improvement.

ok thats fine, wondered why i didnt have any email

Read full topic

item.title: Test my new hosting service - and get free hosting for life
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I am really sorry about the late response to this guys, but there has been some licensing issues with the control panel software we lease, which will mean that you will not be able to have your accounts until tomorrow morning.

I realise that this is not a great start, but hey, this is what beta testing is for, right?

PS. By “for life” I meant until either the service or yourselves ceases to exist. Consider it a reward for being such a helpful bunch… haha. You will be asked to accept a TOS before account creation, by the way, which will clear up issues such as these.

Read full topic

Yes I am here.
I browse the General Discussion every day or two.
I just haven’t posted in a while.
One time I looked at my old graphics topic, and lots of people talked on it and flamed, and then some mod closed it =[
Two days before I looked at it too.[/quote]

We appreciate you because your leet C4D’er
